attributes.comment:
As an Adoptive parent, I object to the increase in the adoption related fees. We
are adopting from China and the waiting time for adoptions is well over the 18
months that the USCIS approval is good for. Therefore, we will have to file twice
and will be subjected to double fees by our own Government, though we will have
not received any additional services.
Costs, when adoptions took place within 18 months:

I600A: $545

Fingerprints: $70 x 2 = $140

Total: $685

What it will be now that adoptions are taking longer plus the increase:

I600A: $670 x 2 = $1340

Fingerprints: $80 x 4 = $ 320

Total: $1660

That's an increase of $975 or over 140%! This is an unacceptable burden on
adoptive parents and the increases should not be implemented.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Rebecca Landwehr
